job_details.Vacaturetitel: Mobile Application Developer (iOS, Swift), LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a skilled mobile engineer with a passion for engineering excellence? Join us at LearnWith.AI, where we are revolutionizing education by integrating AI, gamification, and adaptive learning into our products.

   Your role will be pivotal in developing TeachTap, an app that brings historical figures to life using AI, creating a TikTok-like learning experience that's both fun and educational. You'll be responsible for transforming UI designs into functional app features, fixing bugs, and collaborating closely with our product and backend teams to deliver a seamless, engaging user experience.

   This role offers you the chance to shape the future of education while growing your skills in a fast-paced environment. You'll have significant ownership over the product, directly influencing its architecture, design, and functionality. We're just beginning to explore the potential of generative AI, and you'll play a key role in harnessing its power to free our engineers from routine tasks, enabling you to focus on impactful, strategic work.

   What we offer:
     * The chance to work with cutting-edge technologies in education and mobile app development,
     * A platform to showcase your engineering prowess, directly impacting how students learn,
     * A dynamic environment where technical innovation is not just encouraged but required.

   We're looking for engineers who can deliver solutions at the highest level of quality. If you're passionate about creating robust, efficient, and maintainable code that meets the most rigorous engineering standards, we want to hear from you. Join us in revolutionizing education through cutting-edge app development!

   What you will be doing

     * Taking high-fidelity UI designs and transforming them into interactive and efficient mobile app features,
     * Integrating screens with our modern APIs, ensuring data consistency and responsiveness,
     * Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Getting stuck in endless approval loops - we value swift decision-making and autonomy.
     * Writing code that merely 'works' without considering scalability, maintainability, and performance,
     * Isolated tasks - you will collaborate closely with a supportive product and backend team., * Delivering high-quality apps that serve as the primary interface for students in our online learning environment.
     * Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase to meet evolving educational and technological needs.
job_details.full_text:
Mobile Application Developer (iOS, Swift), LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a skilled mobile engineer with a passion for engineering excellence? Join us at LearnWith.AI, where we are revolutionizing education by integrating AI, gamification, and adaptive learning into our products.

   Your role will be pivotal in developing TeachTap, an app that brings historical figures to life using AI, creating a TikTok-like learning experience that's both fun and educational. You'll be responsible for transforming UI designs into functional app features, fixing bugs, and collaborating closely with our product and backend teams to deliver a seamless, engaging user experience.

   This role offers you the chance to shape the future of education while growing your skills in a fast-paced environment. You'll have significant ownership over the product, directly influencing its architecture, design, and functionality. We're just beginning to explore the potential of generative AI, and you'll play a key role in harnessing its power to free our engineers from routine tasks, enabling you to focus on impactful, strategic work.

   What we offer:
     * The chance to work with cutting-edge technologies in education and mobile app development,
     * A platform to showcase your engineering prowess, directly impacting how students learn,
     * A dynamic environment where technical innovation is not just encouraged but required.

   We're looking for engineers who can deliver solutions at the highest level of quality. If you're passionate about creating robust, efficient, and maintainable code that meets the most rigorous engineering standards, we want to hear from you. Join us in revolutionizing education through cutting-edge app development!

   What you will be doing

     * Taking high-fidelity UI designs and transforming them into interactive and efficient mobile app features,
     * Integrating screens with our modern APIs, ensuring data consistency and responsiveness,
     * Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Getting stuck in endless approval loops - we value swift decision-making and autonomy.
     * Writing code that merely 'works' without considering scalability, maintainability, and performance,
     * Isolated tasks - you will collaborate closely with a supportive product and backend team., * Delivering high-quality apps that serve as the primary interface for students in our online learning environment.
     * Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase to meet evolving educational and technological needs.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on mobile application development (iOS, Swift) and integrating AI features into an existing app. While it mentions 'generative AI' and 'harnessing its power to free our engineers from routine tasks,' it does not detail core Generative AI engineering tasks such as fine-tuning LLMs, building RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering. The primary focus remains on traditional mobile development and using AI as a feature, rather than building AI systems themselves. Therefore, it does not align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer as defined in the coding book.

job_tasks.justification: The description repeatedly emphasizes transforming UI designs into functional app features, integrating screens with APIs, writing robust, efficient, and maintainable code, and delivering high-quality apps that serve as the primary interface for students. This aligns with traditional software development responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: transforming UI designs into functional app features

job_tasks.justification: Integrating screens with APIs is a core task in mobile application development, ensuring data flow and responsiveness.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrating screens with our modern APIs

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into technical solutions, indicating an understanding of the business domain and its translation into technology.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights the importance of writing code that considers scalability, maintainability, and performance, which are key aspects of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: writing code that meets the most rigorous engineering standards

job_tasks.justification: Continuously improving and optimizing the codebase is a standard software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'harnessing its power to free our engineers from routine tasks' suggests an indirect involvement in leveraging AI for efficiency, which can touch upon operational aspects, though not explicitly MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: harnessing its power to free our engineers from routine tasks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'explore the potential of generative AI' and 'play a key role in harnessing its power' suggests involvement in the operationalization or integration of AI, even if not deeply technical.
job_tasks.phrase: play a key role in harnessing its power
